hero.title: Juats
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas. I create beautiful, performant, and accessible experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas, with over two years of experience creating and improving high-impact solutions.

experience1.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
experience1.description: Participation from architecture definition to solution maintenance, ensuring robustness, scalability and alignment with business objectives. Implementation of end-to-end new features (front-end and back-end), delivering high-quality, secure and performant code.

experience2.title: Front-End Technical Lead
experience2.description: Leadership in front-end restructuring, ensuring scalability, performance and efficiency at scale. Development and improvement of the user support screen, optimizing the experience to handle more than 5,000,000 monthly chats in a fluid and responsive way.

experience3.title: Front-End Developer
experience3.description: Architecture definition and strategic technology choices, ensuring a robust, scalable and business-aligned foundation. Coordination of the administrative dashboard front-end team, promoting development best practices.

descriptions.letralandia: Educational app for children's literacy, featuring 3 interactive games, parent area with detailed feedback, and dedicated alphabet learning section
descriptions.suite: Administrative dashboard integrated with omnichannel customer service area, developed for call centers and customer support with modern and intuitive interface
descriptions.meupassApp: Mobile-first app for selling products and services, with special focus on promotional offers and optimized shopping experience
descriptions.meupassDash: Complete administrative dashboard for managing stores in the Meupass app, including inventory control, sales, and analytics

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's work together to create something amazing!

info.title: Let's Connect
info.description: I'm currently available for freelance work and exciting opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

footer.description: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas
